key.name: show-app-icon
key.summary: Show app icons in the Overview
key.description: Whether show app icons in the Overview or not.

key.name: app-icon-position
key.description: App icon position, supporting 'Bottom', 'Center'. Default is 'Bottom'.

key.name: do-not-show-app-icon-when-fullscreen
key.summary: Don't show the app icon when fullscreen
key.description: If a window is in fullscreen mode, like playing video in Firefox, do not show the app icon on the overlay. Because it could cover the playing video.

key.name: window-active-size-inc
key.summary: Window active size increment, in pixels maybe ...
key.description: In Overview, when the cusor hovers over a window, the window will become a little larger, so we can tell which window we are going to click.
